---
name: Bug report
about: Create a report to help us improve
title: ''
labels: bug
assignees: ''

---

**Describe the bug**
A clear and concise description of the problem, what you did, and what you expected to happen.

**Add the following files to the report**
    * ``*_log.txt``, screen log
    * ``*_caseInfo.json``, lots of useful info
    * ``*_raw_user_params.json``, the raw user supplied settings/parameters

**Minimal example**
Be prepared to share a minimal example of your model. 
I.e. share the script that you ran, with the hindcast that you used.
